GLOBAL.title: General Filling Instructions
GLOBAL.instruction: The form must be filled in BLACK ink and in CAPITAL LETTERS. All fields marked with an asterisk (*) are mandatory.
rejections: Form not filled in capital letters
Form not filled using black ink

HEADER_DATE.title: Date of Application
HEADER_DATE.instruction: Enter today's date in DD-MM-YYYY format.

DEBIT_CARD_NO.title: Debit Card Number
DEBIT_CARD_NO.instruction: Enter the 16-digit number on the front of your debit card.

ACCOUNT_NO.title: Bank Account Number
ACCOUNT_NO.instruction: Enter your IDFC FIRST Bank account number.
rejections: Account number mismatch with bank records

TRANS_1_DETAILS.title: Disputed Transaction 1
TRANS_1_DETAILS.instruction: Enter the details for the first transaction you are disputing: Date, Merchant Name, Total Amount, and the specific Amount you are disputing.

TRANS_2_DETAILS.title: Disputed Transaction 2
TRANS_2_DETAILS.instruction: If you are disputing a second transaction, enter the details here. Otherwise, leave blank.
rejections: Partial details entered (e.g., date entered but amount missing)

TRANS_3_DETAILS.title: Disputed Transaction 3
TRANS_3_DETAILS.instruction: If you are disputing a third transaction, enter the details here.

REASON_DUPLICATE.title: Reason: Duplicate Billing
REASON_DUPLICATE.instruction: Tick this box if you were charged more than once for the same single purchase.

REASON_DEFECTIVE.title: Reason: Goods Defective/Not as Described
REASON_DEFECTIVE.instruction: Tick this box if the item you received was damaged, defective, or different from what you ordered. You must attach proof of return.
rejections: Selected but proof of return not attached

REASON_FAILED_ONLINE.title: Reason: Failed Online Transaction
REASON_FAILED_ONLINE.instruction: Tick this box if an online payment failed (screen froze, error message) but money was still deducted.

REASON_ATM_NO_CASH.title: Reason: ATM Cash Not Dispensed
REASON_ATM_NO_CASH.instruction: Tick this box if the ATM did not give you ANY cash, but money was deducted from your account.

REASON_ATM_PARTIAL.title: Reason: ATM Partial Cash Dispensed
REASON_ATM_PARTIAL.instruction: Tick this box if the ATM gave you SOME cash, but less than what you asked for. You must fill in the two amounts below.
rejections: Selected but amounts not specified below

ATM_PARTIAL_DETAILS.title: ATM Partial Cash Details
ATM_PARTIAL_DETAILS.instruction: If you selected 'Partial Cash' above, write: 1) The amount actually received, and 2) The amount deducted from your account.
rejections: Amounts missing while 'Partial Cash' is selected

REASON_CANCELLED_NO_REFUND.title: Reason: Cancelled but No Refund
REASON_CANCELLED_NO_REFUND.instruction: Tick this box if you cancelled a purchase, but have not received your money back. You must attach the credit slip or refund note.
rejections: Selected but cancellation proof not attached

REASON_PAID_BY_OTHER.title: Reason: Paid by Other Means
REASON_PAID_BY_OTHER.instruction: Tick this box if you paid by cash or another card, but this card was still charged. Attach the cash receipt or other card's statement.
rejections: Selected but proof of other payment not attached

REASON_SUB_CANCELLED.title: Reason: Subscription Cancelled
REASON_SUB_CANCELLED.instruction: Tick this box if you were charged for a subscription (like Netflix, Gym, Club) that you had already cancelled.
rejections: Selected but cancellation letter not attached

REASON_GOODS_NOT_REC.title: Reason: Goods Not Received
REASON_GOODS_NOT_REC.instruction: Tick this box if you ordered something but it never arrived. You must enter the expected delivery date below.

GOODS_EXP_DATE.title: Expected Delivery Date
GOODS_EXP_DATE.instruction: If you selected 'Goods Not Received', write the date the merchant promised to deliver the items.
rejections: Date missing while 'Goods Not Received' is selected

REASON_WRONG_AMT.title: Reason: Incorrect Amount Charged
REASON_WRONG_AMT.instruction: Tick this box if the transaction amount is different from your bill amount. Fill in the correct vs. billed amounts below.

WRONG_AMT_DETAILS.title: Incorrect Amount Details
WRONG_AMT_DETAILS.instruction: Write the Correct Amount (what it should have been) and the Billed Amount (what was actually charged).
rejections: Amounts missing while 'Incorrect Amount' is selected

REASON_UNAUTH.title: Reason: Unauthorized Transaction
REASON_UNAUTH.instruction: Tick this box if you did not make this transaction at all and your card was with you the whole time.

REASON_HOTEL_CANCEL.title: Reason: Hotel Reservation Cancelled
REASON_HOTEL_CANCEL.instruction: Tick this box if you were charged for a hotel booking you cancelled. You must enter the Cancellation Date and Code below.

HOTEL_CANCEL_DETAILS.title: Hotel Cancellation Details
HOTEL_CANCEL_DETAILS.instruction: Write the Date you cancelled the hotel and the Cancellation Code they gave you.
rejections: Details missing while 'Hotel Cancelled' is selected

REASON_OTHER.title: Reason: Other
REASON_OTHER.instruction: Tick this box if your issue is not listed above. Write the details in the space provided.

ANNEX_CORRESPONDENCE.title: Attachment: Correspondence
ANNEX_CORRESPONDENCE.instruction: Tick this if you are attaching emails or letters exchanged with the merchant.

ANNEX_SLIPS.title: Attachment: Charge Slips
ANNEX_SLIPS.instruction: Tick this if you are attaching the transaction slips/receipts.

DECLARATION_SIGN.title: Customer Signature
DECLARATION_SIGN.instruction: Sign here to confirm all information is true. By signing, you agree that if the claim is false, the bank may take legal action.

CONTACT_INFO.title: Contact Details
CONTACT_INFO.instruction: Enter your telephone number (with STD code) and the Place (City) where you are signing this form.

BANK_USE_ONLY.title: For Bank Use Only
BANK_USE_ONLY.instruction: This section is to be completed by bank officials only, including service request number, employee ID, branch details, and official signature.
